metadata.description: This code shows the cartoon backbone tube as 65% transparent. It hides the rungs of the cartoon. It shows all of the non-H atoms are sticks. The motivation is to have the cartoon highlight the backbone without dominanting the scene.
code: cmd.do('# Change to the name of your molecular object.;')
cmd.do('# Set to 0.0 to turn off transparency;')
cmd.do('# The default strick radisu is 0.25. I think it is too thick.;')
